name: Worlds Entwined
description:
During a crash in a space junk field, you realise that that the machinery in your space ship merged your world with a different one! Now you are transported back and forth between a space-age world and a fantasy world, each with its own dangers. Fight through hordes of enemies and navigate platforms that disappear with the world. Gather all the missing parts for your space ship to fix the space time continuum! Only you can do it!

  • Action-RPG and platforming elements
  • Two colourful worlds that change every few seconds
  • Mouse & keyboard  and Controller support 

This game was made as an entry to DevSquad Academy Jam 2020 with the theme of 'Connected Worlds'.
